sect1.title: 对象的比较
sect1.para: 在 PHP 5 中，object comparison is a more complicated than in PHP 4 and more in accordance to what one will expect from an Object Oriented Language (not that PHP 5 is such a language).

When using the comparison operator (==), object variables are compared in a simple manner, namely: Two object instances are equal if they have the same attributes and values, and are instances of the same class.
另外一点，when using the identity operator (===), object variables are identical if and only if they refer to the same instance of the same class.
